sentences.sentence: Results 13 of 15 patients were cured but 2 died, one died from recurrent bleeding with multi organ failure, the another from septicemia.
sentences.translation: 结果15例中13例治愈，2例死亡，其中1例死于术后败血症，另1例死于再出血并多器官功能衰竭。

sentences.sentence: An increase in life-threatening hospital-borne infections (such as gangrene, septicemia, tetanus, etc.) and complications (such as shock) can also be expected.
sentences.translation: 危及生命的院内传播感染(诸如坏疽、败血病、破伤风等等)和并发症(诸如休克)预计也将增多。
